metadata.Title: CVE-2014-0048 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
An issue was found in Docker before 1.6.0. Some programs and scripts inDocker are downloaded via HTTP and then executed or used in unsafe ways.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-0048` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

docker.io - 1.10.3-0ubuntu6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: docker.io package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.10.3-0ubuntu6').
